### 1.2 Installation

```{r,eval=FALSE}
if (!requireNamespace("pacman", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("pacman")
library(pacman)
pacman::p_load(GSEABase, GSVA, dplyr,tidyverse)
```

```{r}
library(seneR)
env_Load()
```

```{r}
example_expr <- read.csv(system.file("demo", "GSE246425_counts.csv", package = "seneR"),row.names = 1)
example_meta <- read.csv(system.file("demo", "GSE246425_meta.csv", package = "seneR"),row.names = 1)
```

```{r}
SID_res <- SenCID(example_expr)
```

#GSVA计算

```{r}
gsva_res <- seneGSVA(example_expr)
```

#GSVA绘图

```{r}
merged_data <- rbind(gsva_res,t(SID_res$score_res))
```

```{r}
plot_violin(merged_data,example_meta,'group')
```

单独组画图

```{r}
merged_data <- cbind(SID_res$score_res,example_meta)
```

```{r}
plot_group(merged_data,'group','SID_Score',comparisons = list(c('Old','Young')))
```
